sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SEGEBERG, a town of Germany, in the duchy of Holſtein, and in Wagria; with a caſtle ſtanding on a high mountain, conſiſting of limeſtone, large quantities of which are carried to Hamburg and Lubeck. It belongs to Denmark, and is ſeated on the river Treve, in E. Long. 10. 9. N. Lat. 54. 0.
